com.crudetech.lang

Interface InvocationService


  • public interface InvocationService
    When implemented, it offers several methods to dispatch a Runnable to another thread. A typical use case for this interface is to abstract away calls to SwingUtilities.invokeLater(java.lang.Runnable runnable).

    This interface serves as a lightweight alternative for a full blown ExecutorService implementation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static InvocationService Awt
      A service that invokes Runnables on the AWT event dispatching thread.
      static InvocationService Simple
      A service that invokes Runnables on the calling thread.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> Future<T> beginInvocation(Callable<T> callable)
      Invokes the passed in Callable implementation asynchronously in the target thread.
      Future<Void> beginInvocation(Runnable runnable)
      Invokes the passed in Runnable implementation asynchronously in the target thread.
      boolean isInvocationRequired()
      Returns true, if the call in thread is not the target thread.

    • Field Detail

      • Awt

        static final InvocationService Awt
        A service that invokes Runnables on the AWT event dispatching thread.

      • Simple

        static final InvocationService Simple
        A service that invokes Runnables on the calling thread. This implementations is to be used mainly in unit tests.

    • Method Detail

      • isInvocationRequired

        boolean isInvocationRequired()
        Returns true, if the call in thread is not the target thread.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating if an invocation is required.

      • beginInvocation

        <T> Future<T> beginInvocation(Callable<T> callable)
        Invokes the passed in Callable implementation asynchronously in the target thread. Synchronisation and/or results can be obtained from the returned Future implementation.
        Type Parameters:
        T -
        Parameters:
        callable - The callable to be executed
        Returns:
        A Future implementation for the results an synchronization.
